name: Figma Pitch Deck Template
description:
Meet the Figma Pitch Deck Template, the easiest & most time-saving way to create your professional pitch deck in Figma!


The template features easy to edit slides, predesigned elements, device mockups, maps and content proposals.


You can get the full version with over 102+ slides at

https://www.basetemplates.com/figma-pitch-deck-template
